The taller blonde, despite having much less weight to gain, could never be called skinny again. The weight distributed itself in a fairly routine manner.

First, folds began to appear along the girl's midsection as her blooming belly pooched outward with an enticing jiggle. The belly button deepened dramatically as the baby muffin top quickly progressed to a large round pot belly. The fat continued to climb as her arms lost all definition and the flab began to hang.

Next the taller blonde's sizeable breasts became heavy and bloated. The jugs, while jumping to at least the DD range lost all perkiness and all but collapsed on top of the girl's belly.

A little ripple flowed through the young blonde's legs as her thighs became meaty and completely filled out the fabric of her pants. While her rump thickened only slightly, the girl's hips widened dramatically.

The amount of weight gained by each of the girls was more than enough to force them to move to accomodate. After all even with double doors, the blondes could not stand side by side.
12321111211.title: Passion

123211112112.content:
The night was still young, and the professor did not want to give up on her plans.

Of course with the drastic changes to their appearances, the girls were much more accommodating to Jessica’s desires and readily acquiesced to the professor’s choice of a full sized table despite being a single person.

The woman could barely contain her glee at the power that she now held and truly the feeling was exhilarating if not a little arousing. But now was not the time and place for toying with mere mortals, Jessica was hungry and she wanted to enjoy this experience.

The professor rose to get her first plate of food and immediately headed toward the salad bar before the growling of her stomach drew her attention.

The woman stopped halfway between a row of desserts, and idly, she began to caress her slightly soft tummy. With her brief moment of vindication, Jessica had lost the increased mass that could make this situation worthwhile.

The professor turned her gaze upon the dining room and frowned a bit at her choices.

It seemed that, in general, the people were within normal weights while a few were barely within the range of overweight. However, Jessica was nothing if not resourceful.

“Lose fifteen pounds. Lose five pounds. Lose thirty pounds. Lose ten pounds,” Jessica intoned, going through the place’s occupants and taking bits and pieces from all of them.

All around the restaurant, the customers shrank and lost a bit of flab. Just as well with each loss, there was a subsequent gain to Jessica’s frame.

The professor could feel her body bouncing and jiggling as every small increment packed and added. Her thighs were consistently reshaped, gaining ever increasing amounts of mass and pushing outward in all directions. The woman’s belly burgeoned and blossomed, sinking lower and lower with the added flesh. Her cheeks became full and her arms were large and flabby. If anyone could have beheld the scene, they would have been entranced by the almost hypnotic transformation.

But the professor didn’t slow down. She took in every stray pound and love handle from all corners. Her eyes picked out each and every person and even passing pedestrians from outdoors. Jessica was a woman on a mission and soon the only people in the area that were left untouched were the two hostesses that she had dealt her revenge.

Idly, the woman pondered taking back the weight that she had granted the blondes now that they would be unable to remove her after the entrance fee, but a quick glance at her meaty sausage-like fingers and the magical ring made her realize how overzealous she was. After all, the markings of CURRENT: + 620 can really say it all.

“I don’t think I’m ready to be half a ton,” the woman muttered.

Nevertheless, the professor decided that she would be better off not wasting this opportunity and set to waddle to the delicious goodies that were awaiting her.

Jessica’s burdened gait made the journey much more difficult, but luckily her table was fairly close to the food. Instead of a plate, the woman lifted an entire tray and piled countless pieces of meats and rice. As she went down the line, the food was piled higher and higher until the precarious balancing of a biscuit made her return to her table.

Obviously, the woman’s girth made it impossible to remain on a single chair, and the professor instinctively arranged three chairs to accommodate her girth.

From here, the smells and wonders of the food were finally enough to make Jessica lose control, and she dug wholeheartedly into her meal.

There were no stops for napkins and both hands remained occupied to shovel as much of the food into her mouth as possible. The flavors from the succulent cuts of beef and the chewy fat of the pork mixed within the woman’s mouth. Macaroni and potatoes entered with reckless abandon. Even the sautéed vegetables found their place, mashed up and gulped down.

Jessica knew that all eyes were on her frantic eating and enlarged form, but really she couldn’t bring herself to care. It was as if she had been starving for her entire life and this was the moment that she was allowed to finally satiate her hunger.

All too soon, the tray ran out and the big beautiful woman was forced to get to her feet and amble toward a second course.

This time, a freshly placed tray of spaghetti caught her eye and she succumbed to her hunger to grab the entire thing. After dusting the noodles with an entire container of parmesan, Jessica could barely make her way back to her seat before she dug ravenously into the pasta and slurped and sucked each and every piece down her throat.

Even with more food to satisfy a group of college males in her stomach, Jessica couldn’t help but eye a chocolate fondant covering a large pound cake with layers of butter cream called to her and nothing could make her resist the urge.

In the blink of an eye, the fattening treat was sitting in front of the large girl. For a moment, the woman could swear that she could hear the cake speaking to her, taunting her and any thoughts of fullness disappeared.

Piece by piece. Little by little. The sweet morsel passed through her lips. Jessica could almost feel the pounds climb on with each and every bite, but a night without consequences could not be passed up and she kept going until it was all gone.
123211112112.title: Night

1232111121121.content:
The professor scrunched up her face as a beam of light streamed through her bedroom window. Absentmindedly, the woman stumbled to her feet and lifted one of her massive breasts to scratch underneath it.

Though it took a few moments, it was at this point in time that Jessica realized that something was amiss, and her eyes shot open to look down at the sight of her body.

The young woman marveled as the events of the previous day came flashing back to her, and ruefully, the professor smiled at still having her bloated form.

The giant sausages for fingers flexed carefully and trailed up the woman's meaty and oversized arms. The huge piece of flab wobbled and flowed with the slightest movement.

A sneeze forced the woman to grab hold of her enormous stomach and backside to at least make an attempt to stop the moving, but objects so wide and vast made such an endeavour nigh impossible.

Either way, the professor shook her head. "It was all worth it for last night."

After devouring much of the buffet's food, Jessica had painted the town red, or at least, she painted her face with red frosting, red velvet cake, and what had to have been a mile of Red Vines.

Food, glorious food would have to have been the most apt description of that glorious night. Never had the woman been able to truly cut loose and enjoy such a wonder of wonders.

Being stuffed to the gills with every imaginable food had the obvious effect of making the woman extremely tired, and all thoughts of transferring the weight to others were lost in the haze of the night.

Either way, it was a brand new day and Jessica had a class to teach. With the swiftness of a woman that weighed nearly half a ton, which wasn't all that swift, the professor ambled to shower and eat breakfast.

Miraculously, each and every doorway within her house seemed to have become accomodating to the large woman's size and there was even a bench installed in the showerroom in order to allow her to bathe.

However, to Jessica's dismay, the fact that she normally did not eat breakfast carried over, and not even a box of cereal could be found. With less than an hour to get to the classroom, the woman knew that her current body would make it nearly impossible to be on time if she stopped for food. In the end, it was with a heavy heart that the woman piled herself into her larger but still uncomfortably small vehicle to go to the university.
1232111121121.title: Rest

12321111211211.content:
Huffing and puffing to the front of her lecture hall, Jessica nearly collapsed onto a couple of conveniently placed chairs. While traffic had been reasonable, the long walk to the class needed to be interrupted every few minutes with long breaks and very deep breaths.

The professor took a moment to do a mental count of her class and marveled that it seemed that there were not any drastic changes. The woman had thought that her vastly different appearance would have carried over to vast changes in attendance. For the few semesters that she had been teaching, it had been her experience that the young men that took her class were merely taking advantage of the chance to stare at the prominent jiggle of her rear as she used the chalk board.

With a bit of a mental shrug, Jessica struggled to her feet and connected a Powerpoint presentation on the development of Xenopus, a frog model organism.

For the most part after her time teaching the same class, the woman knew the knowledge to an instinctive level. Her mind wandered to the faces of each of her students to see if their attention was wavering at all. In concurrence with her assumption, she found that very few people continued to stare at her jiggling flesh. While Jessica still had the respect of a professor in her position, admiration of her body had regressed substantially.

Internally, the woman felt a bit disatisfied without the extra attention, but consoled herself with the thought that the change was temporary.

However, the professor became much more interested an adoring freshman girl sitting in the front row. After a couple of months, it was difficult not to recognize her with the young woman's constant appearance at the professor's office hours, and in that time, Jessica was quite cognizant about her physical appearance. Now as the freshman hung upon her every word, the woman noticed a profound difference.

Rebecca, a fairly attractive blonde, appeared to have packed on the Freshman Fifteen and more. Her face was rounder, and her thighs seemed much thicker. The young woman's tight teal top stretched over her torso, showcasing larger breasts, and a little belly that bulged onto her lap. A half-eaten Snickers bar rested by the student's notebook.

Jessica decided that this situation warranted a bit of further speculation. There was more to this mysterious power than met the eye, but the lecture needed to be finished, and that was precisely what she did.

While the marvels of Developmental Biology may be discussed for an indeterminate length of time, all good things must eventually come to an end, and before she knew it, the professor had covered her planned material for the day. Dismissal appeared to be quite evident, and Jessica shook her head ruefully as the class seemed to barrel out of every exit.

The professor gathered her materials, and with a small smile, turned to Rebecca who had stayed behind to follow the much larger woman to her office.
12321111211211.title: Lecture

123211112112111.content:
Of course, after rushing and lecturing on an empty stomach, Jessica decided to make a short pitstop at the main dining area. Oddly enough, it never crossed her mind to change herself back to normal, and the woman just couldn't help ordering a bag full of Baja Fresh burritos to go.

Rebecca, not one to be left out, followed her professor's example and ordered a fair few goodies as well, taking advantage of the many dining dollars remaining on her meal plan.

Luckily, it wasn't quite lunch time. Otherwise, the wait for sustenance would have been almost too much to bear. Instead the transition was fairly smooth, even with the short pitstop for a couple of quarts of ice cream for later.

By the time the women reached the professor's office, they were already ravenous with hunger and could not contain themselves from gorging in lieu of discussing lecture material.

Jessica savored the taste of guacamole, sour cream, and rice in her tortilla-wrapped treats. Normally, her lunch would consist of a small sandwich, salad, and some light yogurt. The explosion of flavor and taste from the hot sauce and salt made the change in food absolutely delectable.

Across from the woman, Rebecca was going through her own ritual of feeding as she unwrapped stacks of tacos and squeezed every drop of lime from the provided sides. The surreal action was like clockwork with the precise bites, layering of pico de gallo, and ever continuing repetition. The professor had even paused for a brief moment to marvel at her younger compatriot's movements. Each bite let loose a decisive ripple of movement that trailed down the girl's upper arms. While Jessica could not see her student's lower body with her desk blocking the way, the woman had a strong inkling that Rebecca's shorts were becoming unbearably tight.

As if on cue, the young woman started to gain a slight look of discomfort, and she shifted her body a bit to try to find a more comfortable position. All too soon, Rebecca realized that that her actions were in vain, and chubby freshman paused a moment to unbutton her shorts and unzip them. Briefly, the girl rubbed her distended belly to soothe any lingering irritation before returning to the remaining tacos.

After a few more burritos, Jessica was significantly less hungry and more able to focus.

"Rebecca, what would you like to ask about?" the professor asked, placing her pudgy hands atop her spherical belly.

The younger woman paused for a moment to wipe her fingers on a few napkins before retrieving her notebook and textbook.

"Do you think that you could go over parts of your lecture with me to see if I got everything?" the freshman queried with a pleading look on her round, dimpled face.
123211112112111.title: Lunch

1232111121121111.content:
"Okay. I think that's it. Thanks for helping me out, Professor."

The quick recap of Jessica's class had been uneventful as far as Rebecca was concerned. Yet, Jessica's mind had been racing at top speed as both passed over her lecture's notes. She had a gut feeling (no pun intended) that she had merely started to touch upon the ring's remarkable properties. And now Rebecca was here as a perfect test subject. Her own increased mass and Rebecca's were perfect for more experimentation. She mentally formulated a set of tests that she could perform with and on her student.

First of all the odd effect the ring had: to make other ignore and instantly accept the changes it put them through. She had to test those limits. Find out just how far it could go. Later, the physical changes beyond the increased mass. Her own car had been a sporty affair until her jaunt the day before had trasformed it into an utiitarian vehicle far more suitable for her new body type. She briefly shuddered at the thought of stuffing her now-immense ass alone into her old car. If she sent all the extra weight to Rebecca, would she get her old car back? And her wardrobe. And if she took in all of Rebecca's added pounds? How would things change? What would be the effect of an added observer alerted to the ring's effects?

So many questions. Even if Rebecca said no to her offer, she was going to find answers. By herself if necessary.

"Professor?"

Jessica stared at her student with quiet intent.

"Rebecca. Are you interested in some extra credit? I need you to answer a few questions I may pose you and assist me in a few thought experiments. You game this weekend?"
1232111121121111.title: Request

12321111211211111.content:
To Jessica's quiet joy, Rebecca had enthusiastically accepted the idea of adding a few credits to her grade. The few hours she'd had to sacrifice would be worth it in her eyes come the time of the final semestral exams. Along the week, the professor gathered the materials she'd need to at least answer some of the questions she'd been assailed with. Reams of paper. A video camera. Permission to access the Physics labs and to borrow three scales good for weights up to a thousand pounds. A set of questions to be answered by Rebecca as the experiment went on. And most importantly, a set of instructions for herself. What to do, what to say. What to point out and what to point away from.

The academic within her gleefully noted she was finally following actual research lines. About time, too. Her original "research" night might have been worth it if nothing else for the incredible experience of feeling her body change into incredible obesity and back and forth again, but it was hardly scientific to go and pig out like she had done. However, it was harder yet to deny her new body's cravings.

In a "normal" day, Jessica now had to eat for at least six of her old self's meals to avoid the dread telltale gurgle of her stomach later on. She'd, in the meantime, gained a new appreciation for the university's excellent cafeteria and blown a fair amount of her credit in it. While she had tried to limit herself to the less fattening foodstuffs, after a few meals she'd given up on whatever limits she'd planned on sticking to. To her credit, after her study session with Rebecca, Jessica had kept a strict log of her weight increase as the days passed - five extra pounds in the week, plus whatever weight she'd gained in her very own night out. It would also be interesting - could the weight she'd accumulated in her fat form be shifted just as well or would she go back to her old figure?

If it couldn't, what would it take to lose those pounds?

And what if she didn't want to?

Jessica, lying in the night, rolling in her newfound corpulence, marveling at the ease with which she'd settled in the alien, fatty body, stared at the life the ring had given her, so different and yet the same. It was such a huge, terrifying, exciting and glorious power. Like stepping out of her skin, or rather, into someone else's. A rather fatter someone else's, she thought with a laugh with a ripple of her belly.

As the week dragged on, she had nearly fallen to the temptation of reshuffling her weight again, getting rid of some of the extra poundage, and maybe adding and removing again and again, feeling her boobs shrink to their original state and inflate with heavy new flesh, and her ass spread and contract as her glutes' mass shifted with stolen fat. She steadfastedly denied the urge. She wanted to get the best data available, dammit, and altering what seemed to be the most important variable in the experiment was just asking for trouble.

And finally Saturday came.

Jessica laboriously arranged the details for her "thought experiment" and smiled with a dimpled grin. Everything was complete save for Rebecca. Three knocks resounded across the empty labs. Jessica beckoned the caller to enter, and Rebecca stepped in.

"Good morning, Rebecca. You ready?"

"Absolutely, Professor. What shall we do for starters?"

"Well, this is a physiological study, so I'll have to ask you to weight yourself. Please use the three scales and record it on your paper. I shall do the same, and then the experiment shall start for real. Just let me set the camera rolling."

Shrugging, the student did so, dutifully recording her own weight of two hundred and fifty eight pounds on each sheet. Jessica passed on to stand on each scale and discreetly bit her lip when she was dictated the number shown by the device: seven hundred and sixty-three pounds. She sighed.

Well, time to lose some pounds. Time for some real changes...

"Okay, Rebecca. Now, I want you to answer this brief questionnaire. It should address some of your own questions. After that, you will go and weigh yourself again."

And so Rebecca sat down and responded the ten-question quiz Jessica had prepared. As once again she climbed on the scale and struggled to look down at the number, Jessica asked, as she focused the video camera on Rebecca:

"Hey, those are cute pants, Rebecca. What size are they?"

"Oh? The pants? They're nice, ain't they? They're size forty-six. Jealous, professor?" Rebecca asked, shaking her sizable ass.

"Heh. Somewhat. You definitely are quite the growing girl, aren't you, Rebecca? Your breasts - what size are they?"

"34DDs."

"Hoo boy. Can you see the number clearly, Rebecca?"

"Yes, I can. It's still the same."

"Good. Keep your eyes on it for a moment."

Jessica closed her eyes and muttered, extending the ring:

"Gain three hundred pounds."
12321111211211111.title: Research Group

12321111211211112.content:
Jessica was understandably dismayed to learn Rebecca would be unavailable that weekend. As much as she wanted to keep herself from experimenting further by herself and altering the whole situation further, she ruefully admitted to herself that only a positive response from Rebecca would have been enough to stop her from further manipulation of her own weight.

Very well. She'd find her answers.

After clocking out of school, she immediately drove to a nearby supermarket and started wandering through the aisles, mentally compiling what she'd need for what was shaping up to be a very busy and incredibly fun evening. It took her an hour to collect everything she'd need, but once she was done, Jessica was sure that evening would be one of her best ever.

The university's swimming pool complex was, as Jessica suspected, crowded with people of all shapes and kinds. As she stared at the many figures basking in the comfort of the water, she couldn't help but shiver in excitement at what was to come. There was even a group of college girls lounging near the entrance; none of hem could be over a hundred and twenty pounds. Jessica mentally prepared herself and cleared her throat.

"Gain fifty pounds. Gain seventy pounds. Gain forty pounds. Gain sixty pounds."

As she spoke, her frame shod more and more of its bloated bulk. Slowly, piece by piece, Jessica's pilfered weight started fading, her body losing its nearly-spherical shape. Her arms' flab withdrew, her rolls pulled inside. Her huge glutes shifted from cellulite-saturated masses into the more defined form of a female ass. Her breasts slowly deflated from watermelons to mere peaches. Likewise, the girls swelled as the weight unnoticeably distributed itself, molding their petite bodies, rounding and filling them. Jessica wished she had thought to get a camera, to film the girls' expansion as many times as she wanted.

No matter. Eventually, she'd have the chance. And she'd leap at it!

"Gain forty pounds. Gain twenty pounds. Gain thirty po..."

Ah. With a sigh, Jessica realized she'd run out of extra weight to throw around. With some surprise, she stared at her reflection on a nearby mirror. She was no longer the same woman who had opened the ring's box and allowed herself to bask in its power. Despite having expended all of the added mass, Jessica felt the immense legacy of their passing. She most definitely had not possessed a prominent muffin top. She was fairly sure her breasts were ever so slightly the wrong size. There were the beginnings of a double chin, and her thighs were slightly thicker.

But the biggest difference was definitely in her ass. Her new, ample bubble butt proudly swelled from her backside. She playfully slapped her new flesh, not caring who might see her, and sighed in anticipation at its jiggling. With a spring in her step, she entered the changing rooms.

Minutes later, she left them, now dressed in a flag-patterned bikini that was perhaps a bit tight on her. Not that she minded.

In a few moments, it was going to get way tighter.
12321111211211112.title: Flying Solo

1232111121121112.content:
As Rebecca exited the office, Jessica began to ponder the odd turn of events that were occurring.

The woman could hardly believe that so much had changed in the span of a day. Before she got the ring, the professor would never have even dreamed of clearing out a buffet or scarfing down enough burritos to feed an average classroom of people.

There was something surreal about the glittering band of silver.

Idly, the rotund woman began to twirl the loop around her pudy appendage. Jessica made note that just like everything around her, the ring itself had altered to accomodate her form.

The professor, eventually, shifted her line of site to the campus below. While her office and lab were actually on the edge of the University's boundaries, the woman had a clear view of the football practice field and the track.

With football season over, attention was shifted to other forms of outdoor athleticism. Tall, lanky individuals could be seen sprinting along the edges of painted lines, and soccer matchup was well under way.

Jessica raised her pudgy arm and for a moment, the woman became jealous of the trim figures running without a care in the world. She focused her eyes on the form of one particularly dark skinned racer, readying herself for a sprint.

Just as the young woman lifted her tall body off the starting position, the professor uttered three simple words, "Gain 20 pounds."

The big beautiful woman nearly burst into giggles as the runner's lithe, muscular frame bulged and rippled. Whereas the girl had appeared fairly curveless from the distance, Jessica could now make out a much different outline protruding from the athlete's compression shorts. Her backside had taken every single pound, thickening and widening the young woman's butt and thighs. The lean tissue was a bountiful harvest of bouncing, bobbing flesh. Quite obviously, finishing the sprint was a chore in and of itself, and one of the girl's fellow athlete's ran over to gesture wildly.

The new girl was obviously irate at the black racer's poor performance. The professor could make out the pinkening of this white girl's face as her blood pressure skyrocketed.

With a few short nods to herself that caused her own body to ripple, Jessica came to a decision when the enraged young lady down below punctuated what seemed to be a particularly vehement statement with a hard slap to her teammate's ass.

"Gain 30 pounds," the corpulent instructor muttered, and as she shrank that tiny bit, the woman also leaned forward with anticipation to see the results of her actions.

Of course, Jessica was not disappointed. The weight apportioned itself quite well to the white girl. With a greater gain and a slightly smaller stature, the effects were rather more drastic. The profile view of this runner's body provided the most prominent changes. While this young woman had widened only slightly, with much of this small portion of fat closing the gap between her thighs, she more than made up the difference by a proverbial blooming of her breasts, only outpaced by the prospering of a potbelly.

The exchange between the two women became much more amicable almost immediately. It seemed that the drastic difference in weight for that one individual had created an interesting sympathy effect. The professor would have followed this train of thought further, but she nearly doubletaked when she recognized a new development.

Before Jessica had interfered with the body shape of two of the runners, the entire team appeared fit, trim, and more than ready to take on any obstacle on the track. However, in an instant, this fact had completely flipped around. Each and every girl had appeared to gain a good few pounds! While barely noticeable from her office, the massive woman could just make out a softening of middles and slightly more pronounced jiggle with every step.

The professor pondered this strange development. A dimpled smirk began to form on the woman's rounded face as the wheels began to turn...
1232111121121112.title: Research

12321111211211122.content:
It was a butterfly effect. So simple and yet ever so devastating. Jessica could hardly believe that she had been blind to the signs, but now everything seemed to make sense. The actions of one have an overwhelming effect on reality around you, and if she herself became massive in size, there would be spillover by association for those around her. It was as if reality bent to accomodate every change in every possible way.

The rotund woman's thoughts shifted to Rebecca and the needless to say drastic increase in the girl's weight. To gain so much in a few short months... time would only tell how drastic that change would be by the end of the school year.

But as every great scientist knows, there is no use in a hypothesis without further testing. To be certain of her findings, the professor needed to experiment, and one building in particular caught her eye.

In the south corner of the school sat three residential halls right next to the most popular dining area in the entire campus. To better acquaint themselves with the residents, the various RAs of the buildings were given meal plans to accompany their impressionable underclassmen to meals.

Of course, the real reason for Jessica's choice was not to pursue scientific knowledge but the fact that said popular dining area was set up as a buffet.

After the professor finished up on some of her research material for the day, she stepped out unto the darkened campus and shuffled to the dining hall. Her rumbling stomach only added to the anticipation of the 708 pound beauty. Perhaps it was the overwhelming exertion, but Jessica's heart was beating excitedly for the show that was due to unfold.

With surprising speed, the woman eventually reached her destination, taking special note of a series of pictures inside the residence hall. Ten girls and two guys were proudly plastered next to floor designations. While diverse, none could have broken 160 pounds.

Inwardly the professor smirked when she received her first look into the actual eating area. Cookies, cakes, and foodstuffs of all kinds were being taken and replaced along the multiple counters, and quite a large number of students were happily gorging themselves on passable food.

As subtly as a giant woman could, Jessica ambled to an empty table close to the food, and gathered a platter of hot dogs to gorge herself on.

For the most part, the students enjoyed the novel experience of a very large person eating with them before settling for whispering and purposely avoiding eye contact.

"Perfect," Jessica thought when she noticed that people had begun to ignore her.

The professor's eyes settled toward the middle of the room on a particular brunette RA. Shoulder length hair, slight belly, and the spreading of her thighs in the seat showed a girl that had a much bigger future. If only she knew how soon that would be.

Right as the girl lifted a piece of salad to her mouth, Jessica intoned, "Gain 100 pounds."

Without fail, the changes came together without fail. The young woman's body underwent a metamorphosis of epic proportions as each and every pound found some way on to her comparatively miniscule frame.

The indentation of a deep belly button on the RA's shirt stretched even further as the bulging bump bloated over her lap. The already meaty thighs thickened and flattened even further along the seat and Jessica simple knew that any gap between the upper legs was now surely gone.

Breasts jiggled and began to hang lower, any hint of muscle tone completely vanished under a creamy layer of fat.

As the changes ended, Jessica turned her attention to the others at the table. A glimmer of a smile crept to her face.

Whereas before the people seated at the table had been fit for the most part, the professor could barely contain her glee to know that her hypothesis had been confirmed. Double chins, plump arms, softening all around. Each of the girls took a bit of spillover and fattened accordingly. Observing became much easier when the table rose en masse toward some plates of burgers and fries.

The professor couldn't help but pick out some of the other RAs around the room. In short order, three others in the corners of the dining hall picked up their own hundred pounds.

Just as before, the young women plumped up in their own little ways, but Jessica wasn't focusing on them. Before her eyes, nearly every young woman in the immediate areas ballooned.

"Fifteen, Forty, Fifty. Those Freshman pounds look like they're here to stay," thought the woman, taking a bite of pie.
12321111211211122.title: Dinner

123211112112111222.content:
Jessica blinked her eyes repeatedly as she slowly but surely awoke from her slumber.

The voices of the morning newscast floated through the room. Apparently, the television had remained on the entire night.

The professor carefully lifted her arms and brushed a few crumbs off of her shirt from the night before.

Sighing, the currently large woman lifted herself into a more manageable position to survey the damage. Empty cartons of cookies and ice cream littered her coffee table along with a couple of extra large pizza boxes. The remains of a six pack of beer were strewn across the floor.

“Ugh. Lately, this place has been looking like it belonged to one of my students,” Jessica muttered to herself, massaging her temples.

Of course, this all started with the discovery of the ring.

The woman idly glanced at the band on her plump finger, the characters CURRENT: +170 standing out starkly.

The professor lifted her form off of the couch with a bit of a groan and slightly waddled to her bathroom, thighs rubbing the entire way. She stripped, turned on the hot water, and used the toilet as she waited for the shower to warm up.

Dispassionately, Jessica stared at her fattened form in the mirror. Nowadays, she could honestly say that she looked different with each passing day. The constant gains and losses of weight shaped and molded different forms on the woman’s frame.
